autopjtree.description: Generate your project structure tree as a Markdown file automatically.
autopjtree.config.ignore: List of folders or files to ignore when generating the project tree.
autopjtree.config.maxDepth: Maximum recursion depth for directory scanning. 0 means unlimited.
autopjtree.config.outputFile: Output Markdown file name for the generated project tree.
autopjtree.configConflictPrompt: Different settings found in multiple locations. Choose which to use:
